urls.title: Report a flood in Suffolk | Suffolk County Council
urls.description: How to report flooding on a road, pavement or property. Who to contact about a blocked drain or flooding on the A11, A12 and A14 roads in Suffolk.

text: @martinstrange1 @EnvAgencyAnglia Hello - while @suff_highways won‚Äôt install sandbags, you can however call our emergency number - 0345 606 6171 if there is a risk of internal flooding. Further details on how to report can be found online via https://t.co/4qHL2unHO1. Hope that helps. Thanks - Georgie
@TheENDSReport @BrianMcHugh2011 @EnvAgency Do you have 'private prosecutions' in the UK? We have retained it in Canada, pretty limited, but sometimes a way to get things rolling

urls.title: Guardian coverage of flood defences
urls.description: Today The Guardian has reported on the condition of flood defences across England, stating that thousands of people and businesses are ‚Äòat risk from ruined assets‚Äô. However, the article did not recognise that when defences are listed as below the required condition it does not necessarily mean that they have structurally failed, or that performance in a flood is compromised.

text:
RT @JamesBevanEA: The @EnvAgency's response to yesterday's @guardian coverage of flood defenses:

urls.title: Severe weather updates
urls.description: Information about council services and how they are being affected by severe weather

text:
We expect river levels to remain high over the coming days and @ODS_doinggood is continuing to closely monitor the situation, working closely with the @EnvAgency which is managing the water flow through the network.

Find out the latest updates: https://t.co/u8RSOthAPb
Thank you to @EnvAgencySE and volunteers in #SouthHinksey once again working to keep flood water out of people's homes @WhiteHorseDC https://t.co/kmSuzg7mI2

@PaulTubb1 @EnvAgency I have yet to experience a person working in Newcastle EA that truly wants to sort our problem out.  People are initially helpful until they obtain certain details and then they all seem very keen to bury the case ü§î  I wonder why? ü§®
@YHClimateCom @EnvAgencyYNE
